title: Add EnsureConfigDir to AgentType interface
description:
Add EnsureConfigDir(h2Dir, roleName string) error to AgentType. Each type sets up its own config:
- ClaudeCodeType: creates <h2Dir>/claude-config/<roleName>/settings.json with h2 hook registrations (moves current EnsureClaudeConfigDir logic)
- CodexType: no-op
- GenericType: no-op

Update agent_setup.go to call agentType.EnsureConfigDir() instead of unconditionally calling EnsureClaudeConfigDir. Remove role.GetClaudeConfigDir() â€” the type owns the path computation.
